attributes.action: Stephen Crabb stand down as Pembrokeshire MP
attributes.additional_details: Stephen Crabb's voting record speaks for itself.  These are not the wishes of the people of Pembrokeshire. We have a lot of vulnerable people in our county, who have had no representations from our MP. He has voted consistently for only his party's wishes and not his constituents. If you agree that Pembrokeshire deserves proper representation please sign our petition. Many thanks
attributes.background: Stephen Crabb has consistently voted against the wishes of his constituents, he does not represent our constituency and is therefore or fit for purpose as our MP. Stephen Crabb stand down as Pembrokeshire MP and allow Pembrokeshire to elect an MP who will do the job properly.

rejection.details: Resignation of an individual MP for  is a decision for the individual rather than the UK Government or Parliament.
